column12: Plot:"A man (Edison's assistant) takes a pinch of snuff and sneezes. This is one of the earliest Edison films and was the first motion picture to be copyrighted in the United States."
Plot:"A man opens the big gates to the Lumière factory. Through the gateway and a smaller doorway beside it
column14: turning either left or right. Most of them are women in long dresses and big hats
column15: but some are men. Suddenly a man with a long apron rushes out through the crowd
column16: followed by a big dog. At last some men on bikes leave the gateway. When all workers have left the factory
column17: the doorkeeper starts closing the gates again."
